donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: TDMRC-UNSYIAH strengthened to provide science-based information, service and knowledge assistance to the local government and other Disaster Risk Reduction(DRR) proponents in implementing their DRR activities.
An Institutional arrangment and an enabling environment are established to facilitate the participatory and concerted implementation of Disaster Risk Reduction measures
Demonstrations of gender sensitive projects are implemented in selected locations to test and improve measures for reducing disaster risk from natural disaster
Disaster Risk Reduction public awareness programmes implemented to promote internalization of a gender sensitive "Culture of Safety" among the people and institutions of Aceh

This output is crucial for successful project implementation.  The attainment of this output will ensure that the project receives appropriate and required policy direction and guidance, technical, financial, and managerial support, and that the monitoring, evaluation, and audit of the project function properly.  Activities required to attain the output involve establishing a viable organizational structure, management arrangement, and supportive funding allocation, and check and control mechanism. 
Strong ownership and engagement of implementing partner (Ministry Of Home Affairs- MOHA and Aceh Government) is indispensible for national implementation modality arrangement. As National Implementing partner, The National Project Director (NPD) from MOHA will embrace the responsibility to monitor and evaluate project implementation at provincial level. As such, regular review with project steering committee members and field visit mission from NPD Office will be undertaken in close coordination with Provincial Project Director (PPD). The monitoring and evaluation assignment will cover project substantive and administrative elements.

project_descr: Disaster Risk Reduction - Aceh (DRRA) is designed to make disaster risk reduction a normal part of the development process.
